verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> that came to Micah <S%H4318><s%> the Morasthite <S%H4183><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Jotham <S%H3147><s%>, Ahaz <S%H271><s%>, and Hezekiah <S%H3169><s%>, kings <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, which he saw <S%H2372><s%> concerning Samaria <S%H8111><s%> and Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

Hear <S%H8085><s%>, all you people <S%H5971><s%>; listen <S%H7181><s%>, O earth <S%H776><s%>, and all that in it <S%H4393><s%> is <S%H136><s%>: and let the Lord God <S%H3069><s%> be witness <S%H5707><s%> against you <S%H136><s%>, the Lord from his holy <S%H6944><s%> temple <S%H1964><s%>.

For <S%H3068><s%>, behold, the Lord comes forth <S%H3318><s%> out of his place <S%H4725><s%>, and will come down <S%H3381><s%>, and tread <S%H1869><s%> upon the high places <S%H1116><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And the mountains <S%H2022><s%> shall be molten <S%H4549><s%> under him <S%H6010><s%>, and the valleys shall be cleft <S%H1234><s%>, as wax <S%H1749><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%>, and as the waters <S%H4325><s%> that are poured <S%H5064><s%> down a steep place <S%H4174><s%>.

For the transgression <S%H6588><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> is all this <S%H2403><s%>, and for the sins of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>. What is the transgression <S%H6588><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>? is it not Samaria <S%H8111><s%>? and what are the high places <S%H1116><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>? are they not Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>?

Therefore I will make <S%H7760><s%> Samaria <S%H8111><s%> as a heap <S%H5856><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>, and as plantings <S%H4302><s%> of a vineyard <S%H3754><s%>: and I will pour down <S%H5064><s%> the stones <S%H68><s%> there into the valley <S%H1516><s%>, and I will discover <S%H1540><s%> the foundations there <S%H3247><s%>.

And all the engraved images <S%H6456><s%> there shall be beaten to pieces <S%H3807><s%>, and all the hires <S%H868><s%> there shall be burned <S%H8313><s%> with the fire <S%H784><s%>, and all the idols <S%H6091><s%> there will I lay <S%H7760><s%> desolate <S%H8077><s%>: for she gathered <S%H6908><s%> it of the hire <S%H868><s%> of a prostitute <S%H2181><s%>, and they shall return <S%H7725><s%> to the hire <S%H868><s%> of a prostitute <S%H2181><s%>.

Therefore I will wail <S%H5594><s%> and howl <S%H3213><s%>, I will go <S%H3212><s%> stripped <S%H7758><s%> and naked <S%H6174><s%>: I will make <S%H6213><s%> a wailing <S%H4553><s%> like the dragons <S%H8577><s%>, and mourning <S%H60><s%> as the owls <S%H1323><s%>.

For her wound <S%H4347><s%> is incurable <S%H605><s%>; for it is come <S%H935><s%> unto Judah <S%H3063><s%>; he is come <S%H5060><s%> unto the gate <S%H8179><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%>, even to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.
Declare <S%H5046><s%> you it not at Gath <S%H1661><s%>, weep <S%H1058><s%> you not at all <S%H1058><s%>: in the house of Aphrah <S%H1036><s%> roll <S%H6428><s%> yourself in the dust <S%H6083><s%>.

Pass you away <S%H5674><s%>, you inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Saphir <S%H8208><s%>, having your shame <S%H1322><s%> naked <S%H6181><s%>: the inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Zaanan <S%H6630><s%> came not forth <S%H3318><s%> in the mourning <S%H4553><s%> of Beth <S%H1018><s%>–ezel; he shall receive <S%H3947><s%> of you his standing <S%H5979><s%>.

For the inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Maroth <S%H4796><s%> waited carefully <S%H2342><s%> for good <S%H2896><s%>: but evil <S%H7451><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%> from the Lord <S%H3068><s%> unto the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

O you inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Lachish <S%H3923><s%>, bind <S%H7573><s%> the chariot <S%H4818><s%> to the swift animal <S%H7409><s%>: she is the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of the sin <S%H2403><s%> to the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%>: for the transgressions <S%H6588><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were found in you <S%H4672><s%>.

Therefore shall you give <S%H5414><s%> presents <S%H7964><s%> to Moresheth <S%H4182><s%>–gath: the houses <S%H1004><s%> of Achzib <S%H392><s%> shall be a lie <S%H391><s%> to the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

Yet will I bring <S%H935><s%> a heir <S%H3423><s%> unto you <S%H3427><s%>, O inhabitant of Mareshah <S%H4762><s%>: he shall come <S%H935><s%> unto Adullam <S%H5725><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

Make you bald <S%H7139><s%>, and poll <S%H1494><s%> yourself for your delicate <S%H8588><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%>; enlarge <S%H7337><s%> your baldness <S%H7144><s%> as the eagle <S%H5404><s%>; for they are gone into captivity from you <S%H1540><s%>.
